acf.egsr_quicktip: YOUR INTUITION GUIDES YOU WELL AND YOU HAVE THE POTENTIAL TO BE A HIGHLY VIBRATIONAL BEING
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOUR INTUITION GUIDES YOU WELL AND YOU HAVE THE POTENTIAL TO BE A HIGHLY VIBRATIONAL BEING

Wow, you have one of the most interesting soul readings I’ve channelled {FIRSTNAME}.

I can sense an emotionally intelligent, intuitive perhaps even psychic vibration—strongly connected to the mysteries and magic of the Universe…

You see directly to the heart of the matter, and have probably spent your whole life helping people settle their differences… sharing your nurturing inner strength and emotional support.

I sense you have a natural way of being in touch with your emotions… and they vary wildly from passionately ecstatic, to feeling deep sadness for a loved one in pain.

You are probably an empath, often taking on the emotions of others around you.

And others might take advantage of your kind and nurturing nature.

You seem to guard your inner world well, not letting people in so lightly… and do this to protect your gentle and sensitive soul from harm.

But your soul is incredibly loyal and you’ll wield your magic, going to the ends of the world to help someone you love.

I can also sense a strong conviction… putting in long hours to see a project through. And if you promise someone you’ll do something, they can count on you 110%... you’ll work hard and long to make it happen...

But despite the efforts you’ve made in your life… the fruits of your labor are yet to mature.

This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back from the next stage in your progression…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
YOU MUST TUNE INTO YOUR SPIRITUAL WISDOM TO RELEASE STUCK EMOTIONS AND RAISE YOUR VIBRATION

{FIRSTNAME}, I think you’ll agree that the hardest thing for an intuitive soul to feel is… misunderstood.

Empaths are so used to being able to take the emotional temperature of people, it’s difficult when people can’t do this with them.

It cuts deep, and can lead to overthinking about the actions you take for others… to be careful not to hurt them... to help where you can…

Then the dark energies can overwhelm you… and all the unrealized expectations and disappointment can consume your beautiful soul.

You might even be prone to depression when this happens.

{FIRSTNAME}, logically you understand that expecting others to know what you’re thinking isn’t going to work… people are rarely as empathic as you…

And keeping your feelings locked up… darkens your energy, blocking your gifts to connect - to your own energy, to the frequency of others... and to the Universe.

In order to banish the negative energy of these emotions, and raise your vibration you must connect deeper with the spiritual side of yourself.

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life, {FIRSTNAME}.

And the decisions you make at this time regarding connection with your spiritual nature will be key in moving you toward your destiny.

The way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

Your gentle, creative and generous soul thrives on connection and care. And all your life your light has shone on those who need your support.

But shadows threaten your light—when you don’t get the care and love you deserve in return.

Speaking up is the key… learning to voice your opinions.

And it’s not as hard as it seems.

You’re already in touch with your emotions… have great powers of imagination, and can be very persuasive… all you have to do—is to let others know how you feel…

And your wisdom tells you… this is much better than the conflict that comes when frustration builds up inside, spilling out into the world, dimming your beautiful light.

When you learn to express your inner world— your frequency will raise.

Then you’ll receive the support and love that you need… from others and the connecting energy around you.
